titles.title: To amend the Federal Credit Union Act to establish procedures for Federal credit unions to provide credit union services to underserved areas, and for other purposes.
Financial Services for the Underserved Act of 2017
Financial Services for the Underserved Act of 2017
Financial Services for the Underserved Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary:
Financial Services for the Underserved Act of 2017
This bill revises procedures for federal credit unions to obtain approval to extend membership to individuals who are from underserved areas but who do not necessarily share a common bond of occupation or association.
